title: Counter-Terrorism Expert Issues ‘Smoke And Mirrors’ Warning Every American Needs To Hear
text:
Dems Show Their True Colors With SICK Move They’ve Prepared For Trump: ‘Any Attempt…’ 
The words from Dr. Sebastian Gorka assume an even more ominous tone as the intense manhunt continues for the terrorist who gunned down 39 people — many execution-style at close range — at the Istanbul nightclub on New Year’s Eve. ISIS has claimed responsibility for the deadly attack. 
Gorka, a national security expert, said Monday on Fox News that political correctness in adopting and pursuing counter-terrorism policies has to stop in order to save U.S. citizens from the kinds of attacks being suffered in Europe. 
Gorka was reacting to the New Year’s speech by German Chancellor Merkel, who said that despite the huge challenge presented by “Islamist terrorism,” her country would remain “free, compassionate and open.” Advertisement - story continues below 
The chancellor again defended Germany’s decision to take in the massive number of refugees last year, indicating that she continues to believe that Europe’s internal borders should remain open to those fleeing violence and persecution. 
By clicking on the video below, you can see why Dr. Gorka told “Fox & Friends” anchor Abby Huntsman that Merkel’s position is an example of “cognitive dissonance.” 
Merkel is facing what many observers believe to be a tough re-election as she seeks her fourth term in office. And it’s her unrelenting stand on opening Germany’s borders to migrants that has become a major campaign issue. Advertisement - story continues below
